title: Merge pull request #8 from jdonmoyer/use-meta-data
message:
Merge pull request #8 from jdonmoyer/use-meta-data

Meta Tag Handling Improvements

title: Meta Tag Handling Improvements
message:
Meta Tag Handling Improvements

- Add performance improvement to only convert meta tag match to lowercase once in the for loop
- Add an updateMetaTag method that will only store the meta tag value if it is non-null and non-empty;  This fixed issues where bad descriptions were being pulled in cases where multiple 'description' meta tags were found and the last one had no value.  See www.fandango.com for an example case where this occurs.

title: Merge pull request #7 from wching/master
message:
Merge pull request #7 from wching/master

Tiny Improvements on Methods - TextCrawler class

title: Tiny Improvements on Methods - TextCrawler class
message:
Tiny Improvements on Methods - TextCrawler class

a. On the for loops, we can improve them by getting the **termination** condition once. In the loops edited above, they were constantly being called every time the loop ended.

b. On the boolean methods, we can just return the value of the statements instead of asking for their value first and then returning them.

Fix issues with obtaining images when src does not end in a known ima…

title: Fix issues with obtaining images when src does not end in a known image file…
message:
Fix issues with obtaining images when src does not end in a known image file type; Performance enhancements.

This work was driven by an attempt to performantly obtain images for Google Play Store links (e.g. https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mufumbo.android.recipe.search)
